reviews.review:
Frozen II - 2/5
This movie is unable to escape from the shadow of its predecessor. For one thing, it is careful to ensure that all of the characters you might have liked from Frozen are back, regardless of whether they fit into the story this movie is telling. The songs are big, centerpiece moments but none of them are able to recapture the phenomenon that was ‘Let It Go', despite their best efforts. The visuals are gorgeous again, and if your kids love the first one then it's a pretty harmless way to pass 103 minutes; adults are likely to be much less impressed.

Closest comparison: It's the best ‘2' from Disney Animation Studios, for whatever that's worth.

Setting: Fantasy
Plot: Adventure
Tone: Family
Definitely lived up to the original. The animation was beautiful, the songs were great, and the character development of Elsa helped shape the plot.

it was an absolutely amazing movie, even for an adult I think i was more emotional and excited than my daughter. the ticket price and concession food price is ridiculous in every way! 25 for two tickets plus  16 for one bag of popcorn and a drink. the prices are criminal at Sundial 12, also a keynote if you have a fandango gift card it will not work there you have to go directly to the fandango web site. but this movie was probably better than the first one in my opinion  we loved it!
Kept my interest the entire time. Great movie!
It was good. Little darker than the first but still selling out ticketed. Too many songs for me. But good.. And Olaf steals the show.

Frozen 2 was FANTASTIC !!!
The visuals were sooo GORGEOUS  AND PERFECT AND THE DETAILS WERE JUST UNBELIEVABLE !!!
The songs were fresh and amazing!
We loved loved the movie!! We still like the music better from the first frozen.
“Scary “ by my girls account, but still impressive imagery and a suitable story. Still stretching it more than they needed, but it’s Disney...
Great movie with outstanding animation.  Enjoyed the story line. However, it was a little to long  for the Grandchildren,s attention span.
